website_summaries.verdict: Though we love its wood appearance, other models are more durable and less cumbersome.
pros: Attractive, clear-coated wood grain appearance and thick plywood construction
Legs are solid, powder-coated steel and designed in a wishbone pattern for easy folding/stacking
cons: At almost 70 lbs., it's heavy and awkward to set up and fold

customer_reviews.title: Exactly fits my needs but it will not arrive pristine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good solid utility table, fits my needs perfectly, but listen to the reviews about it arriving damaged. There was no interior protection. I found 4 significant chips in the surface out of the box. This is not going to affect my use, but if you are going to move it around, I imagine you should expect more to appear. The picture are of the surface of the table, straight from the box.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Frankenstein of tables
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for a formal dinner at our home. Both were damaged but I didn’t have enough time to send them back so I had to use them. In addition to the multiple chips in the veneer, they are not as shown. They have 22 Huge metal bolts on the surface of the table. If you are thinking of using this table without a tablecloth be aware that it is quite ugly with all the visible hardware and chipped veneer.
customer_reviews.author: NL Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming table
customer_reviews.text: I got this to play D&D on in the garage. I was surprised at how nice and solid this table is. It sounds weird but I'm constantly bragging to people about my nice table, and showing it to guests when they come over. They're not as impressed as they should be, because its really just a solid, beautiful folding table.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap table. Terrible shipping package.
customer_reviews.text: Table is really sturdy and the legs snap into place nicely. The table is shipped on a pallet with no cardboard or padding between the table face and the pallet itself. So it showed up scratched and gouged up pretty good all over the table. If you're going to throw a table cloth over it you're good to go otherwise be warned it will be scratched upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked the table
customer_reviews.text: I liked the table, but it came damaged 3 times! The 3rd time I decided just to keep it anyway, as I was tired of having to travel 3 hours to be there when the delivery truck came. The table is sturdy and will be good to do crafts or sewing on it. I gave it a 3 star due to having the damaged tables. Amazon was great about replacing the 1st 2 tables, like I said I kept the 3rd one just because I was just tired of dealing with it. Had problems getting the 3rd one delivered due to delivery company/guy. That's another story, but I won't go into that.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Ann Monigold

customer_reviews.title: but good light-weight metal folding table from my study was set ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't understand the only 'folding' part of this table was only 'folding legs' when I ordered it. Before its arrival, discovered my 'mistake' and started planning what to do when it arrived. Too much to go into here, but the table was set up in my Study & holds my computer & 2 heavy printers. The very old, but good light-weight metal folding table from my study was set up in my dining room to assist with seating arrangements for 12th Night Dinner for 20 people. Read other people's stories re: damaged box & dints on table top. None to speak of with my shipment. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. Sturdy and preassembled. For the money, this is a very good looking table. If I were a trailer park queen, I would put it in the formal dining room of my double wide and show it off with great pride. I bought this table for the same reason most of you are looking at it, I needed more seating for holidays and family get togethers. It doesn't fold in the middle like plastic tables.. It is the same height as the regular dining table, 30 inches and it doesn't wobble when set up on a level floor.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Actually made out of wood!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice and sturdy table. I thought the top was just going to be some kind of veneer, but the entire top is made out of wood with a wood veneer top. The top has rivets but they are recessed in a nice way. The legs are very sturdy. There is a rubber strip around the edge of the table to protect it. I am pretty surprised that it is such a nice table for the price. I would much rather have a wood table than a plastic one. Glad I got this and now will probably get another to replace a smaller table.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Roth

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love This Table!
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived in perfect condition. Was easy to set up and looks great! Very sturdy and a lot of working space on it. Purchased for my production room to work on. It's almost too nice to use. Love how sturdy it is. Great price. Was nervous about ordering a table this size as I'd ordered one from a competitor and it arrived damaged. Would recommend this table to everyone. Meets every expectation and more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large, High-Quality Table; Very Sturdy & Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a 30x72 folding table I'd been using a desk for years. I just love the added space this one provides. It is quite heavy duty. I was surprised with the quality. As others have noted, the connecting hardware is drilled through the top of the table, but it's flush with the table so it hasn't bothered me in daily use. I like this table so much I an thinking about getting another one! It's a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Timo Prime

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Size, Good Quality, Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I needed a wood table this size that was nice a level surface with no texture on top for my craft workspace. No crease in the middle that throws off the level flatness. It did have two small-ish dents on the edge when it arrived. The box was pretty roughed up. The corners have protective pieces over them that come off which is nice. Just a little something for more protection during transit would be ideal. But I got lucky and it's perfectly use-able and flat.
customer_reviews.author: Anomaly

customer_reviews.title: When this table arrived it had a noxious smell that ...
customer_reviews.text: When this table arrived it had a noxious smell that I reported to Amazon. I work with melamine for a living and I could not understand whether it was in the particle board or in the finish of the table that these orders were filling the room. Some particle boards are made with formaldehyde and should not be used in the home. No one could tell me what the table was made of. I had place to table in my garage for about a month and it still has lingering odors.
customer_reviews.author: Jack on the River

customer_reviews.title: perfect PC station and cheaper than a shell desk
customer_reviews.text: bought this 36" by 72" Banquet table instead of a 300 dollar shell desk and I can say I am not disappointed. massive work space, heavy duty material ( I am a 260 pound guy and it doesn't give with me leaning across it ) and the clear coat finish looks good. personally, I like the bolts showing on the surface. they are flush with the desk top but, if you were writing on a piece of paper it may puncture through or force the pen/pencil in a different direction momentarily.
customer_reviews.author: mogreturns

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: The table appear to be sturdy. It arrived by UPS and the box was severely damaged, which resulted in the table being damaged- dented and scratched. The "shiny" top is pretty but all the scratches-- and what looks like glue smudges--take away from the shine. It is way too heavy to put back in the box to return. I am not pleased but it will serve its intended purpose of a craft table.
customer_reviews.author: BARRETT

customer_reviews.title: Great banquet table
customer_reviews.text: I needed a folding table a bit wider than the usual ones and came across this one. It worked beautifully for the event. I did cover it with a table cloth because there are coin like metal screws that can be seen on its topside but that does not take away the fact that it served its purpose. It offers more space for placements, plates, and glasses and makes it much more comfortable to eat. It is super sturdy and well worth the extra dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table for heavy duty users
customer_reviews.text: very study table with solid wood top and quality metal legs. Much better than plastic tables which flex under heavy load. no flexing here. 36" size in bigger than normal, which is good since I wanted extra surface area for large equipment. Surface and finish is not the prettiest but not an issue for me since this is a fairly industrial application. A tablecloth over top and you never notice. Well worth the slightly higher cost than a smaller plastic table.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: This would have been an easy five stars if I didn't receive a table that ...
customer_reviews.text: This would have been an easy five stars if I didn't receive a table that looks like its been repaired and sold as new. You can clearly see where the repairs were done and now it has a scar running across the table. They just added a cover over the crack and repaired it somehow but you can see and feel the crack underneath. I'm not planning on adding a lot of weight and will keep it as is but I'm not going to say i'm completely satisfied. I don't know how long this will last and I could send it back but I'll risk it, once this breaks I'll be buying somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Is21rocks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, sturdy table. It is described as a "folding table," but that does not mean it folds in half. Rather, the legs fold under the table, so it's good to plan ahead as to where you'll be storing it when not in use. Two of us were easily able to carry it down to the basement for storage. Once covered up with nice tablecloth, it will be a great extra table for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Joanmarie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy table. It is heavy and I unpacked it and set it up by myself (huffin' & puffin'....of course I'm not in best physical condition).....i think its GREAT quality for the price. My only suggestio. To the company would be to improve on packaging. The table did have some dings on the edges and 1-small ding on table top ( the dings weren't a deal breaker for me) because package was damaged. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ruth gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  But bad packaging might mean it arrives damaged and you have to re-order replacement
customer_reviews.text: Table appears well built and perfect for a banquet table - much sturdier than a common folding table (and certainly heavier). The dimensions match my regular dining table in all respects - so this makes a seamless extension for holidays and entertaining. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is that the first table arrived with the wood damaged and had to be replaced - second one was fine. The damage was clearly due to inadequate packaging - the table comes in a thin cardboard box with no padding whatsoever. The supplier would be wise to add some corner protectors for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: i rarely am able to buy anything brand new.i was excited to find a table could use in a large kitchen area and a heavy duty wooden table that my mobility challenged husband would not flip over if he became unsteady on his feet.however when the table was taken out of the cardboard there are 3 gouges in the middle of the table,and you can see where it was gouged on the cardboard also.have no idea if it shipped from warehouse damaged or was damaged in transit.if i wanted scratch and dent items ,i would have gone to a discount store.
customer_reviews.author: mg"zombielover"

customer_reviews.title: A Very Sturdy Table.  Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: This is one heck of a sturdy table and it was the absolute perfect size to fit along side my current dining room table. Perfect for large gatherings, this table is so substanial I think it will serve me for a long time. It's quite heavy, I only took off a star because after a month, it still has a strong odor (like a varnish smell) that will hopefully dissipate soon.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Solid table but plan to use a tablecloth
customer_reviews.text: The table came in a cardboard box that was undamaged, but the table itself was damaged. It must have been damaged before it was boxed up. I'll put a tablecloth on it so it's not worth the hassle of returning it. The hinges were so stiff that it took two of us kicking them to get them to lock into place. On the plus side, now that it's set up it'll probably be on our office kitchenette for the next 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Breon

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping it would make it in one piece... and it did!
customer_reviews.text: Read several reviews that the table would arrive banged up, but mine was in great shape. No mars. blemishes,or marks. Legs are tight, strong and the overall table is very sturdy. It doesn't wobble when setting object on it, shifting things around. VERY happy, the table is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: As in other reviews, my table also came with scratches on the surface. But they were minimal. Buyers should also be aware that there is an odor, a chemical smell, maybe the finish, or something. If you can, open this up in the garage and let it air out for a couple of days! Otherwise, it is a totally great table. I use it for my main desk/work station. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Roger K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best table ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one table and then I had to buy two more!!!! These tables are in my craft room and hold up to the weight and size of my crafts. I have made 3 different stations with these tables and they are very sturdy. They hold up to my messy crafts and wipe clean. I also use a craft mat for journaling. These are by far the best for the price that I have ever found. I plan on buying another for when we have family over for the holidays. I am going to throw a festive table cloth on it and have an instant buffet table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table. The table top is solid and sturdy and it is very simple to lock the legs into place. I looked around a lot for a folding table of the same length and this one is far better made than any of the other ones that I could find at a similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: A great table
customer_reviews.text: I have to work from home and needed a solution for my computers. Do I buy a desk? The solution came with Flash Furniture 36'' x 72'' Rectangular Wood Folding Banquet Table. Now I can set up my equipment and if I move it folds up for easy storage!
customer_reviews.author: Charles S. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good table thin packing protection.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good table, the packing material is not proper considering the weight. It was dropped several times because of being handled by one person (that’s all they have in the truck). The thin foam wasn’t substantial enough to protect the table. There is some damage but it’s useable.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Grosse

customer_reviews.title: Came With A Slightly Significant Nick
customer_reviews.text: It came, saw the top, and it had a slight nick that was extremely noticeable. Fortunately I covered it up with my xbox but unfortunately, the nick's existence was still a problem in the back of my mind. Its incredibly sturdy on the other hand. The color is beautiful and in all honesty, I'm planning on buying two more because I love them for the price. Would strongly recommend... hey, for a hundred dollars, worth every (only one) imperfection
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Salomon

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and the sturdiness. It can handle a lot more weight than my plastic folding table without bending or shaking around. I have an embroidery machine that will jiggle the plastic table and then it messes up a stitch every now and then. Not on this table. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: DanB

customer_reviews.title: Good table, wider than most standard folding tables. Fits my blackjack playmat!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was pretty bad, two corners of the table are damaged. But I'm covering it with a playmat anyway, so you can't see them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great Table for what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Graet product, the table is strong and looks great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Good table for the price Yes, there are rivets that can be seen from the top, but they look to make the table stronger than just using wood screws from below like some others do. The rivets are smooth, flat and a tablecloth covers them nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: not bad but item came damage
customer_reviews.text: the table had two marks on the top of it. i had to cover both marks with something so i wouldnt have to send it back.if marks wasnt there its worth the money.received it in good time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Branch

customer_reviews.title: One Corner damaged
customer_reviews.text: ARRIVED DAMMAGED.! You can tell from the box it was dragged by the corner. Otherwise I would Ave given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul001

customer_reviews.title: Good table if delivered carefully
customer_reviews.text: The tables are a good value but they kept getting damaged in delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Erika S. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: The top of the table was surprisingly attractive. Perfect for expanding our seating for a Thanksgiving. Matched the height of our dining room table - wasn’t easy to find a table that worked. We used a table cloth. Satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier than I imagined. Table stayed with a 300+ pound pro wrestler landing on it from the 2nd rope, legs gave out though thankfully. Afterwards it's been sitting outside in rain and sun slowly breaking apart. Last I saw it, it was still somewhat functional.
customer_reviews.author: b0n3z

customer_reviews.title: Legs do not lock in place.
customer_reviews.text: If there was a "zero star", that is what these tables would have would have received. My 6'7" son could not even get the legs to lock in place. The tables are sturdy enough as long as you don't try to move them without having two people. They have to be lifted and sat down rather than slid. If you slide at all, they collapse. Totally dissatisfied!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Our table arrived today and despite the other reviews of damaged tables, ours was in perfect condition. On top of that, it arrived a day earlier than expected. My wife works from home and this is exactly what she was looking for. She makes jewelry and has numerous equipment. Now she has more space to put her things instead of the kitchen table lol!!!!!The table looks and feels strong. We will for sure buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: JasonDW

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The desk arrived scratched with no cover whatsoever. Multiple scratch on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Galahad Curry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table. We wanted something that was classy for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. We wanted something that was classy for thanksgiving and this worked out well. Much nicer than the $45 plastic ones. Solid wood runners underneath. The longer table was tempting but beware you might not be able to get it around corners. So this ended up being the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: B. Scott McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Great, Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: The table is heavy and sturdy. It’s a perfect height and folds up nicely. When you set it up it has an “extra” locking mechanism - to double insure stability. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Tatges

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to set up my remote work station at home, while recovering from extensive surgery...it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B

customer_reviews.title: Better than average folding table
customer_reviews.text: Better than average folding table, but table top arrived with a number of (relatively minor) imperfections
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: great table, well made, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great table, well made. the only complaint is the box it was shipped in. should have more packing material to keep the table unmarred. mine was fine but i see others had problems.
customer_reviews.author: SisterLucia

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy, not too heavy, easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: Could not find a 36” wide table until I saw this one. Was a bit skeptical about size and weight. I love them. I bought 2 and end up ordering 1 more. Not too heavy but very sturdy. Perfect for my holiday meals with my big family. Easy to put up and down. Even tho’ I covered them with holiday table cloths they look pretty enough to use without covers.
customer_reviews.author: PAMAM

customer_reviews.title: Several stains on the table surface
customer_reviews.text: Several stains or blisters on the table surface, appear to some sort of adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: ralph jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, worth the price in my opinion!
customer_reviews.text: This table is great!! I was a little worried since many people said it cane damaged. I wanted a wood table for Pong games as sometimes the plastic kind don’t allow for the ball the bounce well so I wasn’t too worried if it wasn’t in perfect condition. It came so fast and with almost no damage. The one ding I found is pictured but fairly certain I did that from moving it from my front door (husband wasn’t home yet and like I said it came faster than I thought). Very pleased !
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Quality made table
customer_reviews.text: We received our table ahead of schedule and were very satisfied with the product. This is not your cheap made in china table. This table will last a lifetime. I used mine as a crafting table and the 72x36 is big enough for a couple of ongoing projects. Definitely will buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: kellie fay

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tables ever!! Excellent, sturdy construction, tops are gorgeous. They are heavy, so need help moving them around and packing them away. Would buy more of these. I like the 36" width as it's more comfortable for diners on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Jan L Roan

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Be careful with it cuz if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Be careful with it cuz if you hit the floor with it, it will chip and could easily get damaged while setting it up and make sure you lock the legs in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ackert.sarah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shipping, ok table
customer_reviews.text: The tables are good tables, but the packaging and shipping were terrible. I received these through a Donors Choose project for my classroom. It frustrates me that I had so many people give donations for these tables and they arrived damaged! The boxes were beaten, and dents, scratches and dings were VERY visible on all 3 tables.
customer_reviews.author: Halie

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy table however mine arrived with ding and dents ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy table however mine arrived with ding and dents in it. We didn't actually open the box until a month after receiving it so I didn't bother complaining. Plus, I got it on sale. Overall a really good sturdy wide table. Perfect for outdoors or in my case, hosting people for big dinners. Just prob got dinged up during shipping or in production.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Crunched
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with one corner crushed from being dropped on the corner.
customer_reviews.author: furfoot

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Very pleased with the quality, sturdiness and strength of materials used. Received this in perfect condition, delivery team was on time, polite and very helpful in setup. No scratches, very nice finish on all surfaces and nicer than expected. Will purchase from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: betty barfield

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and level.
customer_reviews.text: Use this as a work bench. Perfect dimensions for my hobby.
customer_reviews.author: AG Staks

customer_reviews.title: great desk table
customer_reviews.text: This table is wide enough for everything on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Like them alot
customer_reviews.text: we had some issues with corner edge damage resulting from shipping, but the company did replace the tables at no extra cost to us. They do weigh a bit, but it is to be expected as they are all wood, we like them a lot. We purchased them to go over the seats in the theater for production/Dance comps, worked better than expected Would I buy again? Yes
customer_reviews.author: Sean Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Slight damage
customer_reviews.text: We were please with the style of the table but there was slight damage done to one side, tried contacting UPS did not hear back from them, I think it must've happened during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Howard James

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, attractive and functional- love that this is made of real wood. Good quality, highly reccomend AAA+
customer_reviews.author: Fiona H. Peden

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tables
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to find folding tables 36" wide. These tables arrived in excellent condition. They are actually nicer than I expected considering the price. They are well built and quite sturdy. They are, in my opinion, indoor only tables, or, if used outdoors the weather must be dry. I bought three of them and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W

customer_reviews.title: Lots of superficial damage
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too sore about it, but I feel the need to echo what everyone else has said here. the table showed up with a lot of dents and scratches. it's not a huge deal to me because when I use it it will have a tablecloth, but you should know.
customer_reviews.author: Harley L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Needed more seating for Thanksgiving. Good Size, durable, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and sturdy-  great value
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, sturdy. Love this. I'm using it as a temporary desk right now. It does sit higher than most tables this size so verify the dimensions you need!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: They do not know how to ship a table
customer_reviews.text: Delivered late on a broken pallet. Wood top and plastic edge damaged by the strappings that hold it to the pallet. Finish on top is terrible, massive drip mark and a spot where they rested something on the finish while it was wet and pried it off later. I can fix this but shouldn’t have to...
customer_reviews.author: SE4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my gatherings
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my gatherings! I love how wide the table is so there is room to place flowers in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA MAIRENA

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in the quality of these tables! Both came damaged, one extremely! Where is the quality control, I spent a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table. The only thing once I unpacked it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table. The only thing once I unpacked it from the plastic there was a chip the size of a dime on it. Not a big deal. other than that no other issues it is a great table
customer_reviews.author: William Tizabi

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting table.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Heavyduty, bang for a buck. Nice design and the glossy top which is easy to clean and shiny, always look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: ricomambo69

customer_reviews.title: Great table.
customer_reviews.text: Our table arrived in great condition. Easy to use and substantial weight makes it perfect for use regardless of the situation. We've used it for dining, crafting and display. Surface bolts don't show under a tablecloth.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very poor and also is the shipping of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: You can’t put heavy stuff on it. (180 lbs- no way!)
customer_reviews.text: The table cracked when I put a machine of 180 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Max Arrechea

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service quality
customer_reviews.text: A great table. My wife has loved it. Delivery time was longer because of some technical errors. Apart from that, everything was great. They have responded quickly when I reached them out. Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Hossain Shahin

customer_reviews.title: but the edges were pretty beat up after unpacking
customer_reviews.text: It works for what I need, but the edges were pretty beat up after unpacking.
customer_reviews.author: REM526

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Its actually a very nice looking table top 'cept for the bolt tops all over the top, and the legs are very sturdy. Great size for a desk but I may need something for my arms because the edge cuts into my arms as I'm typing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: great little table
customer_reviews.text: i'm using this table as a desk and i am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Morris

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Table is so well made and it's finished so nicely that you don't need to even put a table cloth over it. Very sturdy and crafted so well.. .. so nice I ordered a second!
customer_reviews.author: @PWG@

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture 8-Foot Rectangular Wood Folding Banquet Table with Clear Coated Finished Top
product_meta.description: Size:36" by 96"This rectangular wood folding table is beneficial in a multitude of settings that include banquet halls, banquet facilities, cafeterias, schools and in the home. The table can be used as a temporary seating solution or be setup for everyday use. This table features a .75'' thick plywood top with black edge band. This folding table is certain to withstand the test of time. Two extra-wide bolted wood runners are fastened to the underside and designed to allow for safe table stacking. The runners are secured to the table tops with flush fitting, flat head bolts and locking nuts. The heavy duty locking wishbone legs are constructed of 1'', 18 gauge tubular steel and commercial grade powder coating.
